def First():
    global T;
    T = int(raw_input());
First();
while (T<1 or T>10000):
    print "The test cases can't be less than 1 or greater than 10000";
    First();
while (T):
    N = int(raw_input());
    if N%2 == 0:
        print "ALICE";
    else:
        print "BOB";            
    T = T - 1;
